sentences.english: A scroll ball makes it easy to get between letters for editing.
sentences.chinese: 軌跡球使得人們更爲容易的在字母間進行編輯。

sentences.english: Using a computer mouse or trackball can be a little tricky.
sentences.chinese: 使用鼠標或者軌跡球有時候會有一點點兒棘手。

sentences.english: Interactions with the TrackBall feel a little scripted compared to the app.
sentences.chinese: 互動與軌跡球覺得有點照本宣科相比應用程序。

sentences.english: Luminous trackball navigation enable you cool touch feeling experience.
sentences.chinese: 發光的軌跡球是你能獲得很酷的觸覺體驗。

sentences.english: Control the trackball to select any question and learn how the scientists will explain.
sentences.chinese: 控制軌跡球選擇問題，聽聽科學家們是如何解釋的。

sentences.english: Move your mouse or trackball in the straightest line possible.
sentences.chinese: 儘可能在最直的線上移動您的鼠標或軌跡球。

sentences.english: Fixed crash, added trackball, video scaling option, portrait mode.
sentences.chinese: 修復崩潰，加上軌跡球，視頻縮放選項，肖像模式。

sentences.english: Press Trackball to confirm, any other key to abort.
sentences.chinese: 確認的話按下軌跡球，按其他鍵取消。
